mainSubtitle: Common investment fraud schemes se khud ko pehchanna aur bachana seekhein
rememberContent: Agar kuch sunne mein bahut accha lag raha hai, to shayad woh sach nahi hai. Hamesha apni research (DYOR) karein aur investment decisions lene se pehle licensed financial professionals se salah lein.
disclaimerContent: Yeh jaankari sirf educational purposes ke liye hai. Yeh financial advice nahi hai. Investment decisions lene se pehle hamesha qualified financial professionals se salah lein. Pichla performance future results ki guarantee nahi deta.

guaranteed-returns.title: Guaranteed High Returns
guaranteed-returns.description: Guaranteed high returns ka vaada karne wale kisi se bhi bahut savdhan rahein. Legitimate investments mein hamesha risk hota hai.
redFlags: Jatil explanations jo samajh mein na aaye
protectiveActions: Company ke baare mein acchi tarah se research karein
Regulatory authorities (SEBI, RBI) se check karein
Licensed financial advisor se salah lein
Jitna aap haar sakte hain usse zyada kabhi invest na karein

urgency-pressure.title: Urgency and Pressure Tactics
urgency-pressure.description: Dhokhebaaz aksar artificial urgency banate hain taaki aap theek se research na kar paayein.
protectiveActions: Acchi tarah se research karne ke liye apna samay lein
Sab kuch likhit mein lein
Bharosemand advisors se salah lein
High-pressure situations se door rahein

unregistered-entities.title: Unregistered Investment Entities
unregistered-entities.description: Hamesha verify karein ki investment entities regulatory authorities ke saath theek se registered hain.
redFlags: Official regulatory websites par listed nahi
Registration ke baare mein golmol ya talne wale jawab
protectiveActions: Mutual funds aur PMS ke liye SEBI website check karein
NBFCs ke liye RBI registration verify karein
Mutual funds ke liye AMFI registration confirm karein
Official registration certificates maangein

unsolicited-offers.title: Unsolicited Investment Offers
unsolicited-offers.description: Aapke paas bin bulaye aane wale investment opportunities se savdhan rahein.
redFlags: Dost ya parivar jo investments ke liye push kar rahe hain
protectiveActions: Unsolicited offers ke basis par kabhi invest na karein
Company ke baare mein independently research karein
Sabhi daawon ko independently verify karein
'Insider information' ke prati sandeh rakhein

complex-schemes.title: Overly Complex Investment Schemes
complex-schemes.description: Dhokhebaaz aksar investors ko confuse karne aur sach chupane ke liye jatil schemes ka istemal karte hain.
redFlags: Investment strategies jo aap samajh nahi paate
Tax benefits ka vaada jo bahut accha lagta hai
protectiveActions: Agar aap samajh nahi paate, to invest na karein
Independent professional advice lein
Saral explanations maangein
Experts ke saath sabhi daawon ko verify karein

pyramid-schemes.title: Pyramid or Ponzi Schemes
pyramid-schemes.description: Yeh schemes maujooda investors ko pay karne ke liye naye investors ki bharti par nirbhar karti hain.
redFlags: Doosron ko invest karne ke liye recruit karne par focus
Naye investors laane ke liye commission ka vaada
Koi real product ya service nahi bechi ja rahi hai
protectiveActions: Recruitment par focused kisi bhi scheme se bachein
Business model par acchi tarah se research karein
Check karein ki koi real product ya service hai ya nahi
'Network marketing' investment schemes se savdhan rahein
